Speaking of corporate shake-ups, Mountain View Internet juggernaut Google revealed that co-founder Larry Page will become CEO effective April 4. Current CEO Eric Schmidt will be executive chairman, and co-founder Sergey Brin will remain co-founder, devoting his time and energy to strategic projects, Eric Schmidt wrote in a blog post.
